messages.message: Just wrapped a demo with a potential customer who's evaluating a few different document processing vendors (called out Ocrolus, Rossum, Sensible by name). He ended the call saying, "I come out of this discussion thinking - wow, this product is the best that I've seen and has the highest degree of functionality & ability to handle variability in a way that other vendors don't. Very cool".

This has been my hypothesis throughout. Our (my!?) job is to get a better lead gen going with a bunch more traffic on the site. But this should be easier to achieve than for our competition to improve on product. Let's push on but this is really cool validation. Thanks for sharin
Will, did you ask for any specifics after he said this? Interested to have more clarity on the delta between our solution and what else is out there.
